bug.author: jyoti59n
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/programmers_guide/embedding#projections>https://www.tensorflow.org/programmers_guide/embedding#projections</denchmark-link>
n the visual for data exploration there are 2 options for distance. One of them should be "Euclidean" as against "Euclidian"

comments.comment: Oh, a typo, right? However, I'm afraid that we should submit the issue to tensor board: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorboard>https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorboard</denchmark-link>

I don't see any typo at "<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/programmers_guide/embedding#projections>https://www.tensorflow.org/programmers_guide/embedding#projections</denchmark-link> ", could you please redirect to the correct link unless it has already been fixed.

If I understand you correctly, you point out the "Euclidian" is not correct name here in the screenshot. And we should correct it to "Euclidean", right? <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1112263/33304540-700729da-d444-11e7-8210-6154886f6e36.png></denchmark-link>

That's correct. Sorry all for a delayed response. <denchmark-link:#>…</denchmark-link>
On Nov 28, 2017 11:36, "Yan Facai (颜发才)" ***@***.***> wrote: If I understand you correctly, you point out the "Euclidian" is not correct name here in the screenshot. And we should correct it to "Euclidean", right?
[image: image] <https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1112263/33304540-700729da-d444-11e7-8210-6154886f6e36.png>
— You are receiving this because you authored the thread. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#14829 (comment)>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AUDM-imxzdl1AkmA-xh4TgujqY0pPt45ks5s66LxgaJpZM4QogjP> .
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/jyoti59n>@jyoti59n</denchmark-link> thanks for reply. I think it is a typo, however we should report the issue to tensor board repository.

The typo is fixed in TensorBoard. Fixing the minor typo in the screenshot would require monkey patching the PNG in Photoshop and uploading it directly to the documentation web server. Re-assigning to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dr4b>@dr4b</denchmark-link> .
It has been 14 days with no activity and this issue has an assignee.Please update the label and/or status accordingly.
We've done this change internally and it just has to propagate out in the next release, sorry. Closing for now.
